name: FILMODŽI 2: Mist opportunity
description:
FILMODŽI: Mist opportunity

Trivia game where you guess the movie by selecting the correct set of three emoji characters. The picture is obscured by a fog, which the player has to remove in order to determine what is he looking at. And even then it might be hard since the movie scenes were generated by AI (Stable Diffusion) using prompts. This demo edition of the game pays hommage to 28 most viewed and well known movies. It was made during 48 hours at Bratislava Game Jam 2022. Enjoy, vote and leave your feedback!

Created by: Dalibor Bartoš, Michal Kabát, Gabika Grajcárová, Filip Ducký & Stable Diffusion
